name: Jubilant Tribble Component Library
description: A collection of reusable HTML components for the Bootstrap 4.6 CMS environment. This file is the master blueprint for AI use.

core_documentation.description: Essential strategic documents that govern the entire system. These should be consulted when building pages or planning content strategy.

style_guide.name: Style Guide
style_guide.purpose: Brand rulebook documenting colors, typography, and CSS utilities including gradient blocks, buttons, and .on-dark utility

internal_link_inventory.name: Internal Link Inventory
internal_link_inventory.purpose: SEO strategy map defining pillar/cluster architecture and internal linking strategy for the entire website
internal_link_inventory.importance: CRITICAL - Consult this when adding internal links to ensure proper pillar/cluster relationships

company_data.name: Company Data Repository
company_data.purpose: Centralized source of truth for all company information including organization details, contact information, logo URLs, author bios, and schema.org structured data
company_data.note: Always reference this file when creating pages that require company information, contact details, or author attribution to ensure consistency across all content.

company_data.name: Sticky On-Page Navigation for Content Pages
company_data.description: A responsive sticky navigation bar that remains fixed at the top of the viewport as users scroll through long-form content. Features automatic section highlighting based on scroll position, smooth scrolling to target sections, mobile collapse menu, and proper styling according to the ColorCopiesUSA design system. Includes jQuery-powered active state management and customizable scroll offset.

placeholders.name: NAVIGATION_LINKS
placeholders.description: Replace the <a> tags in the <nav> section with links matching your page's section IDs. Each href should correspond to a section id on your page (e.g., change href='#section-1' to href='#what-is-bleed').

placeholders.name: STICKY_TOP_OFFSET
placeholders.description: Adjust the 'top' value in style attribute (default: 60px) to change the sticky position offset based on your header height.

placeholders.name: SCROLL_OFFSET
placeholders.description: Modify the scroll offset in JavaScript (default: -120px) to adjust how much space appears above the section when scrolling to it.

color_scheme.active_state: Corporate Red (#d01e25) background, white text, no underline

key_features: Smooth scrolling to target sections (800ms animation)

master_index.name: Master Index of Raw URLs
master_index.purpose: Complete catalog of all raw file URLs in the repository, organized by category
master_index.note: This is maintained separately as a reference guide. The manifest.json provides the structured component inventory.

usage_rules.structure: Do not modify the class names or HTML structure of components. Use them exactly as provided in the files.
usage_rules.content: Inner text, image src, and link href attributes found inside component files are considered placeholders and must be populated with new content.
usage_rules.placeholder_content_rule: CRITICAL RULE: The content inside component HTML files (text, images, links) is for demonstration only and is NOT explicitly marked as a 'placeholder'. You MUST treat all such content as a temporary example that MUST be completely replaced with new content during implementation. Do not merge, append, or mix the example content with the new content.

environment_dependencies.description: All components are designed to work within this specific technical environment. The custom_css file contains gradient background blocks, button styles, the .on-dark utility, and many other pre-built styles that should be leveraged.

gradient_backgrounds.description: Six gradient background classes that MUST be used with .on-dark for readable white text
classes: .blue-gradient-block - Diagonal blue gradient for hero sections and main callouts
.green-gradient-block - Diagonal green gradient for success messages
.green-gradient-block-vertical - Vertical green gradient for success indicators
.dark-gradient-block - Diagonal dark gradient for premium/sophisticated content
.professional-gradient-block - Diagonal lighter blue gradient for subtle sections
gradient_backgrounds.critical_rule: ALWAYS use .on-dark with gradient blocks or text will be unreadable

buttons.modifier: .animate-pulse - Add pulsing animation to any button

dark_background_utilities.description: The .on-dark class makes all text white and links light blue on dark backgrounds
classes: .on-dark - Apply to any dark background container
.hero-block - Special hero section with background image support

links.description: Special link styling for different contexts
classes: .alert-link - High-contrast links on dark backgrounds (very light blue, bold)
.alert-link (on white) - Professional emphasis links on light backgrounds (navy, bold)
.hover-lift - Lift effect on hover (works with nesting)
.readable-width - Constrains text width for better readability

components.name: FAQ Accordion
components.description: A responsive and accessible accordion section for displaying a list of frequently asked questions.

components.name: FAQ Section with Infographic
components.description: A responsive, two-column component that displays a visual infographic on one side and a Bootstrap accordion for FAQs on the other. It is semantically structured with figure and figcaption.

components.name: Page Template: Hero + Sticky Nav (The Shell)
components.description: The main page template for building new content pages. It includes the hero, sticky navigation, breadcrumbs, and author meta-data. IMPORTANTLY, it also contains the necessary CSS to render the 'Pillar Page Snippets' correctly.

components.name: Pillar Page Content Snippet Collection
components.description: A library of reusable HTML blocks designed to be placed inside the 'Page Template: Hero + Sticky Nav'.

snippets.name: Snippet: Light Green Card with Two Images
snippets.description: A block with a light green background, a bulleted list, a title, and two images at the bottom.

snippets.name: Snippet: Final Call-to-Action
snippets.description: A full-width, blue-background call-to-action section with multiple buttons.

components.name: Snippet: Best Practices & Popular Applications
components.description: A self-contained, two-part component with styled cards and 'chips' for showing file preparation guidelines and common product uses. It includes its own <style> block.

components.name: Snippet: Visual Guide with Interactive Tabs
components.description: An interactive component with two tabs for displaying a video and image examples. It is self-contained and includes its own <style> block for a yellow 'attention' tab highlight, but still requires Bootstrap 4 JS for the tab functionality.

components.name: Snippet: Product Options Selection Guide
components.description: A detailed guide component with multiple tables and sections for helping users choose between different product options (like coating, covers, colors, etc.). Includes an optional 'Quick decision' alert box.

components.name: Snippet: 'Best For' Use Case Checklist
components.description: A component that provides a quick, scannable list of ideal use cases (pros) and non-ideal use cases (cons) for a product, with a final paragraph linking to a comparison guide.

components.name: Snippet: Specifications at a Glance Table
components.description: A structured, two-column table for displaying key product features and specifications, typically used in the DESCRIPTION 1 area of a product page.

components.name: Snippet: Interactive Process Steps
components.description: A 4-step interactive timeline that reveals detailed content for each step. It is a self-contained component with its own <style> and <script> blocks, but requires Bootstrap 4 and jQuery to be loaded on the page.

components.name: Sticky On-Page Navigation
components.description: A sticky navigation bar that remains fixed at the top of the page as users scroll. Features automatic section highlighting based on scroll position, smooth scrolling to target sections, and mobile-responsive collapsible menu.

placeholders.name: NAVIGATION_LINKS
placeholders.description: Customize the <a> tags inside the <nav> element to match your page sections. Each href attribute should correspond to a section id on your page (e.g., href='#section-name').

placeholders.name: SECTION_IDS
placeholders.description: Ensure each target section on your page has an id attribute that matches a navigation href. Use <section id='section-name'> tags for best results.

placeholders.name: SCROLL_OFFSET
placeholders.description: In the JavaScript, adjust the -120 offset value (scrollTop: target.offset().top - 120) if your sticky nav has a different height or if sections aren't aligning properly when clicked.

placeholders.name: ACTIVE_THRESHOLD
placeholders.description: In the JavaScript scroll function, adjust the -150 offset (var sectionTop = $(this).offset().top - 150) to change when sections are considered 'active' during scrolling.

components.name: Snippet: Collapsible Quick Answers Block
components.description: An interactive block that uses Bootstrap's collapse functionality to show key points upfront and reveal more details when a 'More details' button is clicked.

components.name: Snippet: Pricing Examples Table
components.description: A simple but powerful table used on product pages to provide concrete, indexable pricing examples for different configurations. Each example links directly to the pre-configured product URL.

components.name: Demonstration: Stress Test Page
components.description: This is a reference file, NOT a reusable component. It shows live examples of all the global CSS classes from the STYLE_GUIDE.md, including .on-dark, gradient blocks, buttons, and interactive effects.
